events.message: I received the wrong item in my last order and I want to get a refund because this is not what I paid for.
Customer reported receiving incorrect product and requested refund; case classified under Refund cluster.
Support agent assigned to handle refund request for wrong item received by customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Here is my order number 123456789 and attached you will find the photo showing the incorrect item delivered.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for resolving this quickly. I appreciate the prompt refund offer and the clear communication.
We have now processed your refund. Please allow a few days for it to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund successfully. Please let us know if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Closing this case as the refund has been completed and customer confirmed satisfaction.
